title: Ice
synopsis: By A.D. 2010, all men have died off quickly due to a dramatic change in the environment and an unknown contaminant. The population decreased to the lowest number ever seen...until only the women were left alive.
voices: ['Minagawa, Junko', 'Ootori, Yoshino', 'Ono, Erena', 'Koizumi, Yutaka', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Kitamura, Eri', 'Mamiya, Kurumi', 'Satou, Natsuki']
staff: [['Inoue, Hiroaki', ['Producer']], ['Kobayashi, Makoto', ['Director', ' Art Director', ' Background Art']], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Hirano, Yasushi', ['Script']]]
